SQL.LOAD: SELECT sp_user_claims_id, property_name, property_value, effective_date, expiration_date, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date, sp_user_claim_properties_id FROM elp_sp_user_claim_properties WHERE sp_user_claim_properties_id = :sp_user_claim_properties_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_sp_user_claim_properties SET sp_user_claims_id = :sp_user_claims_id, property_name = :property_name, property_value = :property_value, effective_date = :effective_date, expiration_date = :expiration_date, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE sp_user_claim_properties_id = :sp_user_claim_properties_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_sp_user_claim_properties ( sp_user_claims_id, property_name, property_value, effective_date, expiration_date, created_by, sp_user_claim_properties_id ) VALUES ( :sp_user_claims_id, :property_name, :property_value, :effective_date, :expiration_date, :created_by, :sp_user_claim_properties_id )
